{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3547760,"name":"Craig","username":"CraigFromCambridge","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/7cd45c/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-05T00:22:10.349Z","cooked":"

Hello all -

We’ve seen a bunch of 3D printed drive & motor mounts but non of them seem to include flanges for locking the CAN & encoder connectors into their receptacles. We (along with many others) have had trouble with the friction connectors coming loose.

Hot glue is possible, but we don’t love it as are a long harness of mini-cable ties (put strain on the wires).

Would love to hear ideas
